sentences.sentence: Their new manifesto hardly threatens to bring the whole edifice of capitalism crashing down.
sentences.translation: 他们新的宣言声称要摧毁整个资本主义大厦，这是不可能的。

sentences.sentence: A group of men are erecting a monstrous copper edifice.
sentences.translation: 一群人正在建造一座巨大的铜色建筑。

sentences.sentence: All were detained in the Salem Gaol, a grim edifice of granite blocks, iron-barred windows and brick-walled cells.
sentences.translation: 所有人都被拘禁在萨勒姆监狱中，这是一座用花岗岩砌成、装有铁栅栏窗户和砖墙砌成的牢房构成的可怕建筑。
